item.title: Tarkovsky's films online for free
item.description: - Mosfilm, one of the largest USSR film studios, has uploaded full-length versions of many highly acclaimed and influential films on YouTube for free.

item.title: Scar tissues make relationships wear out (2013)
item.description: - Relationships are hard to maintain, both personal and professional.

item.title: Reflections on Ten Years Past the Snowden Revelations
item.description: - The memo reflects on the impact of Edward Snowden's revelations about NSA's activities on security, privacy, and human rights.

item.title: Lawyer cites fake cases invented by ChatGPT, judge is not amused
item.description: - Lawyer and law firm face sanctions after submitting court documents that cited fake cases from a fake database created by an AI language generator named ChatGPT.

item.title: Servo, the parallel browser engine written in Rust
item.description: - Servo is a web rendering engine written in Rust, which is a programming language.

item.title: Building a Personal VoIP System
item.description: - The Tech Times editor wrote a guide on setting up a personal VoIP system using open-source tools, aimed at self-hosting experts unfamiliar with VoIP.

item.title: ChatGPT conversations can be shared publicly
item.description: - Hacker News is a social news website focused on technology, startups, programming languages, computer science breakthroughs, and broader societal implications of these areas.

item.title: Introduction to Algorithms: A Creative Approach by Udi Manber [pdf]
item.description: - Jane Street's feature "exclave" optimizes away heap allocation, decreasing allocation time.

item.title: Hard stuff when building products with LLMs
item.description: - Honeycomb has released Query Assistant, a tool that uses natural language to respond with a Honeycomb query.
